alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 3:51PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern El Paso and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Fountain, or 19 miles south of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Fort Carson, Stratmoor, Security and Security-Widefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
